summary.para: Retrieves the file-name attribute of the package.

param.name: fileName
param.para: A string that contains the file name of the package.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: You can pass the package file name that GetFileName outputs to the method to access the package’s contents.
When you're done using the file name, free the memory allocated for fileName by using the function.

summary.para: Retrieves the offset of the package relative to the beginning of the bundle.

param.name: offset
param.para: The offset of the package, in bytes.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Retrieves an object that represents the identity of the app package.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: Call the method when you have finished using the packageId object.

summary.para: Retrieves the type of package that is represented by the package info.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Retrieves an enumerator that iterates through all the <Resource> elements that are defined in the app package's manifest.

param.name: resources
param.para: The enumerator that iterates through the resources.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK.

summary.para: Retrieves the size of the package, in bytes.

param.name: size
param.para: The size of the package, in bytes.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Provides a read-only object model for a <Package> element in a bundle package manifest.
